title: Quick Instagram Posts Checker · Apify
name: Quick Instagram Posts Checker
description: Fast Instagram stats (for profiles and post only) for bulk tracking and analytics
readme_summary: Fast Instagram stats (for profiles and post only) for bulk tracking and analytics. Features: Fastest tracking of Instagram web shareable data: get stats for any public post or profile. Usage Costs: Around 0.02CUs per 100 posts or profiles. Input example: startUrls array with URLs of Instagram profiles or posts. Output example: Array of objects with Instagram profile or post data.
